markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deathcap Powder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3331)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=633" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 292 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 249 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The toxic deathcap mushroom can be dried, ground, and treated to form a flavorless powder with accelerated effects. 

**Saving Throw** DC 33 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 7d8 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 2** 9d6 poison damage and [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91) 2 (1 minute); **Stage 3** 8d10 poison damage and sickened 3 (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Deathcap Powder
